meta.title: Privacy Policy
meta.publisher: Information Bureau, GIST Undergraduate Student Council

intro: In accordance with Article 30 of the Personal Information Protection Act, this Privacy Policy is established to protect the personal information and rights of users utilizing Ziggle ("ziggle.gistory.me") and to handle grievances related to personal information promptly and smoothly.
notices: The "Information Bureau" will notify users through announcements (or individual notices) at least 7 days prior to the implementation of any amendments to this Privacy Policy.
This policy is effective as of August 14, 2023.

content.subtitle: Service Sign-up and Management
content.text: Follows the privacy policy of the GSA Integrated Account login.

content.subtitle: Provision of Services
content.text: Collects personal information necessary to provide services, which may include personal information for service improvement.

content.subtitle: Utilization for Marketing and Advertising
content.text: Processes personal information for purposes such as analyzing access frequency or statistics on user service usage.

sections.title: Processing and Retention Period of Personal Information

content.text: Personal information is processed and retained within the retention/usage period stipulated by law or the period agreed upon by the data subject upon collection.

content.subtitle: Specific Periods
items: Sign-up and Management: Until the termination of the service contract or membership withdrawal

sections.title: Rights and Obligations of Data Subjects and Legal Representatives and How to Exercise Them

content.text: The data subject may exercise the following rights at any time:
items: Request for access to personal information
Request for correction in case of errors

content.text: Regarding the exercise of rights, it must be verified whether the requester is the person concerned or a legitimate representative; other matters follow the GSA Integrated Account Privacy Policy.

content.subtitle: Service Sign-up and Management
items: Required: Email, GSA Integrated Account Identifier

content.subtitle: Provision of Notice Writing Function
items: Content of the written notice, photos

content.subtitle: Destruction Procedure
content.text: After the purpose is achieved, the information is moved to a separate DB and stored for a certain period according to internal policies and other relevant laws, after which it is destroyed without delay.

content.subtitle: Destruction Deadline
content.text: The information is destroyed within 5 days from the end of the retention period, or within 5 days from the date when the personal information is deemed unnecessary.

sections.title: Installation, Operation, and Rejection of Automatic Personal Information Collection Devices (Cookies)

content.text: To provide individualized customized services, 'cookies' are used to save and frequently retrieve usage information.

items: Purpose of Use: To provide optimized information by identifying visit and usage patterns, popular search terms, secure connection status, etc.
How to Reject: Tools at the top of the web browser > Internet Options > Privacy Menu > Option Settings
Note: Refusing to store cookies may cause difficulties in using customized services.

content.text: Oversees overall tasks related to personal information processing and is responsible for handling complaints and remedial compensation.

sections.title: Measures to Ensure Safety of Personal Information

items: Administrative Measures: Access rights restricted to limited administrators
Technical Measures: Use of firewalls, detection of abnormal access, encryption, etc.

content.text: In the event of any addition, deletion, or correction of content according to laws and policies, notification will be made through announcements starting 7 days prior to the implementation of the changes.
